1109842.reason: Vulnerability applies to glob CLI (-c/--cmd with shell:true). Data Wings does not use glob CLI in production runtime; glob is a transitive dependency of eslint-config-next. Keep as known risk until eslint-config-next upgrades transitive glob.
1109842.mitigation: Do not invoke glob CLI on untrusted filenames in CI/dev scripts.

1112653.reason: Next.js 14.x advisory (DoS via request deserialization). Upgrade path requires Next >= 15.0.8; treat as known risk for local/dev while keeping Release gate on docker-only environments and restricting public exposure.
1112653.mitigation: If self-hosted publicly: apply rate limiting/WAF on server actions endpoints; plan Next upgrade.
